code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import Aqua from'../../Themes/Aqua/Aqua';import{Darker}from'../../Themes/Darker/Darker';import axios from'axios';import{StoreBaseUrl}from'../../constants';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function StoreView(){const[theme,setTheme]=useState('aqua');const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);const[storeData,setStoreData]=useState({'store_name':'','contact':'','license':'','products':[]});const getProducts=async()=>{await axios.get('https://4ka6rp5lp5.execute-api.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/production/api/store/product?shop_owner_username=amal&division_name=main hall&store_name=malabar').then(res=>{console.log(res.data);setProducts(res.data);}).catch(e=>{setProducts([]);});};const search=async keyword=>{if(keyword!=null){await axios.get("https://4ka6rp5lp5.execute-api.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/production/api/store/product?shop_owner_username=amal&division_name=main hall&store_name=malabar&search=".concat(keyword)).then(res=>{console.log("searching...");setProducts(res.data);}).catch(e=>{setProducts([]);});}};const getStoreData=async()=>{const store_owner_username="amal";const division_name="main hall";const store_name="malabar";await axios.get(StoreBaseUrl+store_owner_username+store_name+division_name).then(res=>{setStoreData(res.data);});};const data={'store_name':'malabar','contact':'9946658045','license':'74237482394237497239','products':products,'search':search};useEffect(()=>{getProducts();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[theme==='aqua'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Aqua,{data:storeData}):"",theme==='darker'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Darker,{data:storeData}):""]});}export default StoreView;
